topic.title: Setup
topic.shortdesc: To set up the Tempest VM deployment:

ol.li: Ensure that a copy of the Red Hat Enterprise Server 7 Installation DVD ISO is in the /store/data/iso directory

li.p: Several steps in this document use files to configure the environment. These archive files are available from https://wiki.opencrowbar.org.
Download the dell-mgmt-node and dell-pilot-deploy archive (zip or tgz) files and extract them into the /root directory as per the example below.
li.codeblock: # mkdir /root/pilot # cd /root/pilot # unzip /PATH/TO/FILE/dell-mgmt-node.zip or tar zxvf /PATH/TO/FILE/dell-mgmt-node.tgz # unzip /PATH/TO/FILE/dell-pilot-deploy.zip or tar zxvf /PATH/TO/FILE/dell-pilot-deploy.tgz
